Modesto.Modesto City\u2013County Airport:
Modesto City–County Airport (IATA: MOD, ICAO: KMOD, FAA LID: MOD) (Harry Sham Field) is two miles (3 km) southeast of Modesto in Stanislaus County, California, USA.


== History ==
Modesto City–County Airport was the nation's first municipally-owned airport, opening in 1918. At first the airport southeast of downtown Modesto was only 82 acres (33 ha); it moved in 1929 to the current location. Over the years it grew to its present size of 435 acres (176 ha).
